content.rendered:
New Apple iPhone 12 Pro (512GB) – Graphite
6.1-inch Super (*12*) XDR show
Ceramic Shield, harder than any smartphone glass
A14 Bionic chip, the quickest chip ever in a smartphone
Pro digicam system with 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide and Telephoto cameras; 4x optical zoom vary; Night mode, Deep Fusion, Smart HDR 3, Apple ProRAW, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording
LiDAR Scanner for improved AR experiences, Night mode portraits
12MP TrueDepth entrance digicam with Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording
Industry-leading IP68 water resistance
Supports MagSafe equipment for straightforward attachment and sooner wi-fi charging
